item.title: ML Model Evaluation
item.description: references To Read: https://towardsdatascience.com/handling-imbalanced-datasets-in-machine-learning-7a0e84220f28 questions ml model evaluation methods Classfication Accuracy Precision Precision = \(\frac{True Positive}{True Positive + False Positive}\) From all the postive prediction given by our hypothesis/model how many examples where true positive Recall Recall = \(\frac{True Positive}{True Positive + False Negative}\) From all the postive examples how many examples where correctly classified by our hypothesis/model F1 Score A harmonic mean between recall and precision
